article_text:
Sound Off! (Photo: serazetdinov, Getty Images/iStockphoto)

COUNTY — Commissioners Hancock and Garrett, without a doubt you retaliated against Sheriff Vigil, which is what the county administrators are known to do, but it's time that you get over your egos and start working for the Doña Ana County residents.

COUNTY — To the caller who is asking why Julia Brown will not allow funding for the sheriff's legal representation, maybe she has read the “Common Sense” pamphlet written by Thomas Paine.

BUDGET — Congress just passed their budget, allotting $1.6 billion to resettle illegal immigrants. My 92-year-old mom gets $685 a month from Social Security that she paid in to for over 30 years, yet she gets no cost-of-living raise. What kind of country turns it's back on the most vulnerable?

SPORTS COMPLEX — What gives with the sports complex in Mesilla? Two public meetings but the applicant does not show up. Now he meets with Larry Shannon privately. Is this transparent?

GOV. MARTINEZ — Don't you people have anything better to do than bash Susana Martinez? She's a saint compared to Bill Richardson. Susana shows a little bit of human nature, has a little fun at a party.

2016 — Jeb Bush is the only presidential candidate that shows me anything. Look what he did in Florida. He helped that state immensely but people are too dumb to figure that out and they're going instead for all the other bunch of clowns that are running.

SOCCER — So the two recently banned big shots of FIFA plan to prove their innocence. My question, why didn't they prove their innocence before the ban?

IMMIGRATION — Statistics show that violent crimes by undocumented immigrants have gone down 40 percent since 1993, but facts don't seem to matter to conservatives.

2016 — Hillary managed to ignite the Twitter world, and not in a good way, when her campaign website posted "7 things Hillary has in common with your abuela", and "#NotMiAbuela" filled with negative comments. Many Hispanics were highly insulted by such blatant "Hispandering."

OBAMACARE — With the continuing insistence of Republicans that they will kill ObamaCare when in total power, hopefully the new surge of young voters who are signing up for ObamaCare will take notice.

2016 — Donald Trump's unacceptable behavior tells me something about the crowd that continues to support him. It's a negative feeling that I have about him.

SPORTS COMPLEX — It would be a great idea to have a sports complex. Right now we have a complex for soccer, which we pay between $700 to $900 per team for.

COUNTY — This county fiasco is getting worse every day. Now we, the taxpayers, are going to pay attorney fees for all individuals involved.

2016 — Was watching Donald Trump and I'm sure he's using words that he never learned at his mother's knee. I would have had my mouth washed out with soap if I had. Of course, the Republicans love him and his potty mouth.

PRESIDENT — I respect the service of our veterans, but I don't believe one has to be a veteran to be president of the United States. Franklin Roosevelt, World War II, and Woodrow Wilson, World War I, were not veterans. Even Abraham Lincoln only served as a soldier for a very brief few months. Putting these constraints on presidential candidates is absurd!

GOV. MARTINEZ — Our governor is caught on police audio recordings obviously inebriated and very rude to responding officers when called because her staff were hurling bottles of the hotel balcony during a loud staff party. This after her secretary of state was sentenced for embezzlement.

2016 — When Ted Cruz carpet bombs ISIS in Syria and Iraq, he should know he will be killing innocent Christians who are still living there. Not only will he be killing thousands of innocent Muslims but thousands from his own faith.

Be heard: Call 575-541-5466 or email soundoff@lcsun-news.com to submit an item.
